isis.stitle: BRAKE COMPONENTS: This Service Manual Section should be used for reference only. For more current service information on all components go to the Bendix website from the ISIS Suppliers menu and refer to the Service Data Sheets. - TWO WAY CONTROL VALVE (BENDIX TYPE TW-1) - CLEAN AND INSPECT

step1.para: Wash all metal parts in cleaning solvent. Use compressed air to dry parts.
Check plunger (Item 6) for damage. Hollow hole plunger must be clean and free of all foreign material.
Inspect small end (exhaust seat) of plunger (Item 6) carefully; if chipped, worn or distorted, replace.
Check plunger return spring (Item 3) and valve spring (Item 5) for damage.
Valve body must be replaced if seat is worn excessively or damaged.
